itemDescription: British peer and member of the House of Lords (1917-93)

wikipedia_page.main: Lloyd Tyrell-Kenyon, 5th Baron Kenyon,  (13 September 1917 - 16 May 1993), was a British hereditary peer, member of the House of Lords, and academic administrator. The only son of Lloyd Tyrell-Kenyon, 4th Baron Kenyon, he succeeded to the title of Baron Kenyon on his father's death in 1927.
